insert into Home_tb(home_num, home_type, addr1, addr2, addr3, home_area, trading_type, deposit, monthly, rent_periods, room_count, admin_cost, parking, pet, elevator, balcony, move_date, floor, home_title, home_detail) values((select nvl(max(home_num), 0) + 1 from Home_tb), #{homeType}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{addr3}, #{homeArea}, #{tradingType}, #{deposit}, #{monthly}, #{rentPeriods}, #{roomCount}, #{adminCost}, #{parking}, #{pet}, #{elevator}, #{balcony}, #{moveDate}, #{floor}, #{homeTitle}, #{homeDetail})
select Max(home_num) as homeNum From Home_tb
insert into Home_Option_tb(option_num, home_num, option_name) values ((select nvl(max(option_num), 0) + 1 from Home_Option_tb), #{homeNum}, #{optionName})
insert into Home_Img_tb(img_num, home_num, img_name, home_img_path) values((select nvl(max(img_num), 0) + 1 from Home_Img_tb), #{homeNum}, #{imgName}, #{homeImgPath})
